title: Karma & Melodies
description: Second chances at love don't come very often, even for a vampire who has eternity.Kendra used to spend her days organizing events for Caf√© Enigma while daydreaming about Marcus, the sexy lead singer of Normal Paradox. But all those dreams of becoming Mrs. Rock Star died, along with her mortality, the moment Hector entered her life. He tricked her and seduced her into becoming a vampire, stealing Kendra away from Marcus forever.Ten torturous years later; however, Kendra finds a way to escape Hector and is reunited with her lost love, Marcus. Now that she's found him she doesn't want to let him go. But, whispered threats from Hector begin invading her dreams. He's tracking her down, and she can feel it. He's a true monster, capable of unspeakable horrors, and Kendra knows what he will do if he catches them.She'll have to make a stay and fight for the man she's always loved, or protect him by leaving and keeping Marcus off of Hector's radar?This novella is approximately 30k words or (120 printed pages). It contains some offensive language but no sexual content.
